name: Lightbringer (FrostBandit)
description:
Trapped in darkness, only the Lightbringers claps of light can help her find her way out. Help her escape by solving the puzzles blocking the way out and light up your surroundings. But be careful, your light might attract what's hiding in the dark... 

Created by

  • Main Programmer: Daniel Hansen (Twitter: @wanieru)
  • Main Programmer: Levi Moore (Twitter: @LeviMooreDev)
  • Music and Programming: Camilla Vallentin (Twitter: @Vallencavnt)
  • Art: Stine Lund (IG: @MagicRatPrince)
